title: We Have Other-Worldly Threats, but Canâ€™t Define Gender | Guests: Dave McCormick & Andrew Puzder | 5/17/22
description:
Congress is holding a UFO hearing due to a mysterious aircraft being tracked that appears to have advanced tech. Meanwhile, the National Science Teaching Association held a seminar called "Queer Your Classroom." How can we handle out-of-this-world threats when we're confused about what gender is? Glenn and Pat discuss the media's absurd attempt to link the Buffalo killer to conservatives. Pennsylvania Senate candidate Dave McCormick joins to discuss his race and where he stands on issues like ESG scores. Glenn and Pat discuss the baby formula shortage and immigration. Andrew Puzder from the Heritage Foundation joins to discuss the dangers of ESG. Wyoming state Sen. Bo Biteman shares how his state is fighting social credit scores.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
